reviews.text: This is a great bar with friendly staff and owner. Drinks are a great deal as well. Place is very spacious and has a great outdoor patio with lots of tables.
Great spot for drinks and karaoke on campus. My friends and I have been coming here for karaoke for years. It's still just as much fun now as it was then....

I've loved oldfields from day 1 at OSU. 
Game days are fun here, especially if you aren't ready to take on a high street bar on game day. 
The owner is also...
